twitch_info.title: Highlight: Hydrohomies but I'm out of woter

message.body: Ich will speilen der speil. Was that even close to correct?
Ich will das Spiel spielen
Bruh
Why don’t you try to use correct grammar in Swedish. See how that turns out.
Fart means speed in swedish
Slut means end
Is this correct? Ich bin fünfsehn Jahre alt.
fünfzehn
You and your z’s
fünfhundertfünfundfünfzig
Ich will ertrunken dich. Is that correct.
nope
You Germans and your grammar
Sjuhundrasjuttiosju
I assume you wanna say "I will drown you."
Yes
Ich werde dich ertränken
important
Say this. Sju sjösjuka sjömän sköts till sjukhuset av.
Av sjuksköterskan”
Sj, sk, stj and sch are all pronounced the same btw.
And no sch isn’t like the German sch sound.
Ive only played I wanna maker and I wanna kill the guy. I know sue me

I think I’m gonna beat I wanna lockpick
I shall now take my leave. Bye bye

btw is this sign truth or not, as in your progress is properly saved (if/when an area allow for it)
yeah
if you save somewhere in a stage it will put you back there if you exit to hub and come back another day
